title: Ring Note Loop
description: A live loop that plays a fixed note and then a ring of notes.

code.live_loop:
live_loop :ringNote do
  play 60
  sleep 0.5
  play (ring 10, 20, 30, 40, 50)
  sleep 1
end

title: TB303 Synth Loop
description: A simple arpeggio loop using the tb303 synth.

code.main:
live_loop :synth do
  use_synth :tb303 #try changing :tb303 to piano or kalimba
  play :c4
  sleep 0.5
  play :e4
  sleep 0.5
  play :g4
  sleep 0.5
  play :e4
  sleep 0.5
end

title: Hoover Scale Loop
description: A looping major pentatonic pattern using the hoover synth.

code.main:
use_synth :hoover
loop do
  #try changing number of octaves, scale,release time
  play_pattern_timed scale(:c3, :major_pentatonic, num_octaves: 3), 0.125, release: 0.1
  sleep 0.25
end

use_synth :pluck
